name: The amazing odyssey of growing up
name_original: The amazing odyssey of growing up
description:
Alt game made with cardboard art about a kid who must grow up.

Instructions: Just use the mouse to click on close objects or drag items from the inventory to use them . It's a jam game, so some minor bugs could appear. Press "R" is you get stuck to reset the level.

Credits:

@barvoodo - game design and sound

@Oluwagembi - art and voice-acting

@Ludipe - game design and code

@Alex Zarzalejo - music
